name: Light It ~ てらし鬼 ~
description: Light creatures and stop them. 'Light It ~ terashi-oni ~' is a 2D stealth action game with a game element of 'Red light Green light'. Light enemies with a flashlight and explore a dark island. Furthermore, you can make your original levels.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: 3 Ghz or faster processer Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Xbox360 Controller recommended
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
